sentence.Network_en: She was safe from predatory birds on the verandah.
sentence.Network_cn: 在阳台上她不会遭到猛禽的袭击.

sentence.Network_en: Horn made him a sign to come onto the verandah.
sentence.Network_cn: 荷恩向他打了个手势,要他到游廊上去.

sentence.Network_en: Men in straw boaters and waxed mustaches crowded the verandah.
sentence.Network_cn: 头戴草帽、留着蜡黄胡子的人挤满了走廊.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...通常在英语中使用而纯粹是来自葡语的词汇有praia(普腊亚，佛得角群岛首府)verandah(走廊)、mandarin(中国官员、官话)、compradore(买办)linguist(语言学家)、galleon(西班牙大帆船)、caravel(西班牙和葡萄牙轻快多桅小帆船.
